Paraguay (py)¶

Forms¶

PY-specific Form helpers.

class localflavor.py_.forms.PyDepartmentSelect(attrs=None)[source]¶

A Select widget with a list of Paraguayan departments as choices.

class localflavor.py_.forms.PyNumberedDepartmentSelect(attrs=None)[source]¶

A Select widget with a roman numbered list of Paraguayan departments as choices.

Data¶

localflavor.py_.py_department.DEPARTMENT_CHOICES = ((u'AG', u'Alto Paraguay'), (u'AA', u'Alto Paran\xe1'), (u'AM', u'Amambay'), (u'AS', u'Asunci\xf3n'), (u'BQ', u'Boquer\xf3n'), (u'CG', u'Caaguaz\xfa'), (u'CZ', u'Caazap\xe1'), (u'CY', u'Canindey\xfa'), (u'CE', u'Central'), (u'CN', u'Concepci\xf3n'), (u'CR', u'Cordillera'), (u'GU', u'Guair\xe1'), (u'IT', u'Itap\xfaa'), (u'MI', u'Misiones'), (u'NE', u'\xd1eembuc\xfa'), (u'PG', u'Paraguar\xed'), (u'PH', u'Pdte. Hayes'), (u'SP', u'San Pedro'))¶
